description: Query a list of domains and other domain related objects such as domain applications and transfers.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: QueryDomainList
Indicates the version of the command. To access this version 2 of QueryDomainsList, 2 must be use used as value
If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Set to 0 to suppress the return of the TOTAL response property. This will impore response time. If set to 1 the TOTAL response property will be returned

Parameter by which the output will be sorted.Must be one of the following:OBJECTID, OBJECTIDDESC, DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTIONDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC, UPDATEDDATE, UPDATEDDATEDESC, EXPIRATIONDATE, EXPIRATIONDATEDESC, PAIDUNTILDATE, PAIDUNTILDATEDESC, ACCOUNTINGDATE, ACCOUNTINGDATEDESC,  FINALIZATIONDATE, FINALIZATIONDATEDESC, FAILUREDATE, FAILUREDATEDESC
Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL

Additional properties to be returned can be specified here. Currently supported values are:TRANSFER: if used, the response will contain the transfer related propeties TRANSFER-CREATEDDATE, TRANSFER-DIRECTION, TRANSFER-NEWREGISTRAR, TRANSFER-OLDREGISTRAR and TRANSFER-STATUSPRICE: if used, the response will contain the properties CURRENCY, RENEWALGROSSPRICE, RENEWALPRICE and VAT
Only show objects with an description that matches the pattern specified here.
Only show objects where the domain name matches the pattern specified here.
Only show domains stated here
Only show objects where the domain name matches the regular expression specified here
Only show objects where the domain name does not matche the regular expression specified here
If set to 1 an extended domain list will get returned
Only show objects with an ID that matches the pattern specified here
Only show objects with an object class that matches the pattern specified here
Only show objects with an object class that matches the regular expression specified here
Only show objects with an object class that does not match the regular expression specified here
Only show objects with an object subclass that matches the pattern specified here
Only show objects with an object subclass that matches the regular expression specified here
Only show objects with an object subclass that does not match the regular expression specified here
Only show domains with a status that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains with a status that matches the regular expression specified here
Only show domains with a status that does not match the regular expression specified here
Minimal creation date of returned objects
Maximal creation date of returned objects
Minimal updated date of returned objects
Maximal updated date of returned objects
Minimal expiration date of returned objects
Maximal expiration date of returned objects
Minimal paid until date of returned objects
Maximal paid until date of returned objects
Minimal accounting date of returned objects
Maximal accounting date of returned objects
Minimal finalization date of returned objects
Maximal finalization date of returned objects
Minimal failure date of returned objects
Maximal failure date of returned objects
Show only objects which are set to the renewal mode specified here.Can be AUTOEXPIRE, AUTODELETE or AUTORENEW
Only show domains which belong to a repository that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which belong to a user that matches the pattern specified here
Sub user
Only show domain objects that that have a local presence service activated that matches the pattern specified here. Set to 0 to only show objects that do not have any local presence service activated
Only show domain objects that that have a privacy service activated that matches the pattern specified here. Set to 0 to only show objects that do not have any privacy service activated
Owner contact
Admin contact
Tech contact
Billing contact
Any of the domain contacts
Transfer direction
